name: Ice Path
desc: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.

name: Teleportation
desc: Teleports to any point on the map.

name: Disruption
desc: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.

name: Essence Aura
desc: Whenever nearby allied Heroes or Outworld Devourer itself casts a spell, it gains a chance to restore a percentage of its mana pool.  Outworld Devourer also passively gains a bonus to its base mana pool.  Several skills with no cooldown and toggled spells cannot trigger Essence Aura.

name: Magnetic Field
desc: Generates a circular distortion field of magnetic energy that protects allied heroes and buildings within it by evading attacks coming from outside the field.

name: Arcane Bolt
desc: Skywrath Mage launches a slow-moving bolt of arcane magic, dealing damage to an enemy unit based on Skywrath Mage's intelligence.

name: Lightning Storm
desc: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Healing Ward
desc: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at 420 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.

name: Primal Split
desc: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Bedlam
desc: Dark Willow's pet wisp roams around her for the duration, rapidly attacking nearby enemies.  Bedlam cannot be used while Terrorize is active.
